forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In the early hours of the evening, a gentle tranquility envelops Downtown San Francisco, with the temperature resting comfortably around 54 degrees. The sky, partly cloudy, hints at a calmness that sets the stage for the day ahead. As the sun rises tomorrow, it promises to unveil a sun-drenched tableau, with temperatures creeping up to approximately 66 degrees before tapering off in the afternoon. A soft west-southwest breeze will play through the streets, bringing a refreshing touch without overwhelming. 

Although the forecast suggests a sunny disposition, the lingering whispers of the marine layer may still be felt, cloaking the distant Golden Gate Bridge in a mysterious veil. Fog may cling to the coastline and linger over the bay, creating a contrast between the vibrant city and the shaded waters beyond. Dress in light layers to accommodate the warmth of midday while prepared for the cool shadows. This is the sort of day conducive to simple pleasures; meander through local parks, indulge in leisurely coffee at a sidewalk café, or explore the hidden architectural gems nestled among the hills. The city holds a quiet invitation to bask in its beauty, still and serene, for those who seek it.
